channel.title: design on The Quiescent Current
channel.description: Recent content in design on The Quiescent Current

item.title: TLA+ Chapter 1: Reflection
item.description: The first time I opened Hillel’s book and skimmed the first chapter I was subconsciously looking for a reason not to sink a bunch of time into yet another language/ecosystem project. That bias prevented me from seeing the point of the first chapter. Hillel’s first chapter ends with a definition of stuttering and how in the presence of real world temporal effects, a safe, reliable in all cases wire transfer system borders on impossible.
